content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Hi. My AC isn’t working well, I think it needs a tune-up or something.
I’m sorry you’re having trouble with your AC. I can help get you scheduled for a technician to check it out. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Jake. Could you please provide your address so I can make sure we have a technician available in your area?
Great, thank you! Can you let me know what days and times work best for you to have someone take a look at your AC?
Um, probably like later afternoon, after 3pm. Any day works honestly but I have class in the mornings and work at night sometimes.
Thank you for providing your availability. Let me check our calendar for the next available appointments after 3pm.
The earliest we have available for an HVAC technician after 3pm is this Thursday at 4:30pm or next Monday at 3:30pm. Would either of those times work for you?
Shoot, I actually have work right after 4 this Thursday and Monday is a test day. I don’t think those work for me.
No problem, Jake. Is there another time that might be possible, or should I check for the next available opening later in the week, maybe in the early evening?
Honestly my schedule is too random right now. I’ll just try again later when I know for sure. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer unavailable for proposed time slots.
